title: Episode 65: God and Self Help, Synchronicity, and Listener Feedback
description: Some of the most popular self help books such as the Power of Positive Thinking and A Course in Miracles rely on references to god and religion. In this episode I add a few thoughts to the previous episode on how scientists view self help books which rely on references to god.  I also share emails listeners send to me and I let you know how I will be adjusting The Psych Files podcast in response to your feedback.
